args.old_str:

args.new_str:
67    directions = {} # this is the dictionary you should return, this dictionary have the calculated pca component(first one component) for each layer's hiddenstate
    68    for layer in hidden_layers:
    69        H = hidden_states[layer]
    70        # recenter hidden states
    71        H_centered = recenter(H)
    72        # store mean for this layer
    73        self.H_train_means[layer] = torch.mean(torch.Tensor(H), axis=0).cpu().numpy()
    74        # run PCA
    75        pca = PCA(n_components=self.n_components)
    76        pca.fit(H_centered.cpu().numpy())
    77        # take the first principal component
    78        directions[layer] = pca.components_[0]
    79    return directions
